name: famish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to suffer from extreme hunger or to make someone suffer from extreme hunger: Russia famished under the Five Year Plan. Repeated crop failures almost famished them.
More examplesFewer examplesSome say that ravens foster other chicks whilst their own birds famish in their nests.Did he marry me to famish me?Mothers half alive carried their children famishing with hunger in their arms.
